title: Inside Uber’s Mission to Give Its Drivers the Ultimate App
text:
Inside Uber’s Mission to Give Its Drivers the Ultimate App 
Published By: Wired.com - Today 
After more than a year of research and development, Uber is rolling out the first-ever redesign of its driver app. Here's the story of how i...
